title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Life Sciences
purpose: To raise awareness and understanding of the valuable contribution the life sciences sector provides to the health and wealth of the nation and the important role of charities, industry, and academies in supporting and funding medical research and commercialisation to the benefit of patients across the UK.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 5605.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Emma Lawrence, UK BioIndustry Association. Tel: 07880 009251
contact_details.secretariat: UK BioIndustry Association and Association of Medical Research Charities jointly act as the group's secretariat. https://www.bioindustry.org/ and https://www.amrc.org.uk/
